titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the possession or transfer of handgun ammunition capable of being used to penetrate standard body armor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 6/19/1997--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit any person from possessing or transferring a piece of handgun ammunition which is capable of being used to penetrate standard body armor. Provides exceptions. Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to: (1) determine the capability of ammunition to penetrate such armor; and (2) publish such determination in the Federal Register.
